#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
bool areAnagrams(char a[],char b[]){
	int x[26]={0},y[26]={0};
	for(int i=0;i<strlen(a);i++)
		x[a[i]-97]++;
	for(int i=0;i<strlen(b);i++)
		y[b[i]-97]++;
	for(int i=0;i<26;i++){
		if(x[i]!=y[i])
			return false;
	}
	return true;
}
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		char a[22],b[22];
		cin>>a>>b;
		if(areAnagrams(a,b))
			cout<<"YES\n";
		else
			cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
